meanings.definition: Allow oneself to enjoy the pleasure of
meanings.sent1: She indulges in chocolate cake on special occasions.
meanings.sent2: He often indulges in watching his favorite TV show after work.
meanings.sent3: The cat indulges in long naps under the warm sun.
meanings.sent4: Her mind indulges in dreams of far-off adventures.
meanings.sent5: Indulging in laughter with friends brings joy to her heart.

meanings.definition: Gratify or give in to a desire
meanings.sent1: He indulges his sweet tooth with a piece of candy.
meanings.sent2: She sometimes indulges her curiosity by exploring new places.
meanings.sent3: The child indulges in a tantrum to get what he wants.
meanings.sent4: His imagination indulges in wild fantasies of flying through the sky.
meanings.sent5: Indulging in creativity allows new ideas to flourish.
